content: **skill level confident beginner - intermediate** ready to move beyond basic rectangles this crochet pattern is designed for beginners who want to level up without diving into stitch chaos the body of the project is worked primarily in double crochets and chains making it relaxing and rhythmic while a small number of double_crochet decreases add gentle shaping and skill-building don t worry every decrease is clearly explained so you re learning as you go not guessing the pattern finishes with a puff border that adds texture polish and just enough flair to make the finished piece feel special best of all this project works up quickly making it perfect for an i actually finished something moment **you ll practice ** * double_crochet * chain stitches * double_crochet decreases clearly explained * puff border a great pattern for crocheters who know the basics and are ready for their next skill unlock without rage quitting or frogging the entire project ✨ disclaimer this is an indie-designed pattern and has not undergone third-party tech editing or testing the pattern has been written and tested by the designer and every effort has been made to ensure accuracy and clarity if an error is found please contact the designer
